channel.title: How do you edit the max cash to 2417m or whatever?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm a beginner coder and i was wondering... How would i edit the max cash to 2147m i think it is...?
I've been looking in client.java and item.java etc.. and couldn't find anything. I also tried searching Moparscape and Google but for some reason i didn't find anything either. If you could please give me some simple directions, it would be greatly appreciated!
Thank you, ALSO sorry if i missed some Topic or something D:

item.title: How do you edit the max cash to 2417m or whatever?
item.dc:creator: @mattbruce93 mattbruce93
item.description:
@mattbruce93 wrote:

can u make it higher like 10b or something?
You can, Although i honestly would NOT recommend it. As you would most possibly LAG out because the client your using would not support Over 2147m.

I’ve experienced it myself.

So yeah, i wouldn’t do it.

-Matt

Read full topic
item.source: How do you edit the max cash to 2417m or whatever?
